summary: The Bumstead family is off to see relatives in the country when Blondie runs into Charlie and Millie, an eloping couple needing her help.
cast: Penny Singleton|Arthur Lake|Larry Simms|Daisy|Jonathan Hale|Danny Mummert|Irving Bacon|Glenn Ford|Luana Walters|Will Wright|Spencer Charters|Leona Roberts|Stanley Brown|Mary Jane Carey|Tommy Dixon|Jay Eaton|Richard Fiske|Si Jenks|Charles Lane|Rex Moore|John Tyrrell
title: Blondie Plays Cupid
